name: Lord of Alcandria: Chapter II
overview: Lord of Alcandria: Chapter II begins in an empty graveyard in the middle of the night. Suddenly a burst of magical sparkles appears, then disappears, above one of the gravestones. A moment later, a gray hand pushes up through the earth... In this fantasy point & click adventure game, you take on the role of the reanimated corpse of Krilok Rainwood, 13th century warrior. Your first task is find out who just performed your resurrection, and what they have planned for you.
